about_the_game:
A young man in high school tragically dies.
And even more tragically, goes to Hell

But turns out Hell is not fire and brimstone.
Hell is a corporate office building.

And the reason the main character is in Hell is because an intern screwed up his paperwork SO badly that now his only way out of Hell...is to do her job for her!

The player must act as the devil on the shoulders of 5 different people on Earth who are scheduled to die that day.

Play through 5 different stories and make bad decisions to ensure that each human dies on schedule, before upper management gets wind of the mistake.

If the player completes all 5 missions, the infernal intern (Yoshina) will return the otherwise damned player get back to his body.
Fail, and they will stay trapped in an endless realm of infinite toured that is a corporation.I mean, Hell.
And there's no unpaid overtime.
Now get to work!

A young man in high school tragically dies.
And even more tragically, goes to Hell

But turns out Hell is not fire and brimstone.
Hell is a corporate office building.

And the reason the main character is in Hell is because an intern screwed up his paperwork SO badly that now his only way out of Hell...is to do her job for her!

The player must act as the devil on the shoulders of 5 different people on Earth who are scheduled to die that day.

Play through 5 different stories and make bad decisions to ensure that each human dies on schedule, before upper management gets wind of the mistake.

If the player completes all 5 missions, the infernal intern (Yoshina) will return the otherwise damned player get back to his body.
Fail, and they will stay trapped in an endless realm of infinite toured that is a corporation.I mean, Hell.
And there's no unpaid overtime.
Now get to work!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: DEAD LAST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

esrb.descriptors: Themes involving death, existentialism and the afterlife, cursing, alcohol and drug references, and dark humor.

short_description: A young man dies and goes to Hell, only to discover that Hell is a corporate office building. And the only way out is the make a deal with a devil...even if she is just an intern.
